actions.name: Crystallization
actions.description:
Effect: The user's Immunities, Resistances and Weaknesses are modified to the following and ignores their regular Typing's interactions.

Weaknesses: Electric/Fighting/Fire/Ground

Resistances: Bug/Fairy/Flying/Grass/Ice/Normal/Radiant/Rock

Immune: Water

The user is immune to all effects of other Abilities, Attacks and Effects that can modify Type. This Pokemon can only Terrastalize into the Stellar Tera Type.
